author: JEFF HORVATH STAFF WRITER
title: State police: Olyphant man assaulted EMS worker Christmas Eve morning | Crime-Emergency | thetimes-tribune.com
text: An Olyphant man faces felony and other charges for assaulting an emergency medical services worker early on Christmas Eve.
